amendatorysection.chaptername: State University, State Colleges, And Postsecondary Education
amendatorysection.para: The agent's permit shall be in a form approved by the department and shall state in a clear and conspicuous manner at least the following information:
(1) The date of issuance, effective date, and term;
(2) The correct name and address of the agent; and
(3) The school which such agent is authorized to represent.
The term for which an agent's permit is issued shall not extend for more than three calendar years.
